name: dirtyantaeus
text: I would never be afraid to shake Philippe's hand.

text: this is basic.

name: waddlerz
text: A comment left by waddlerz was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by 7th_shot, mystkmanat, nielj)

name: rainwolfj
text: They have hands , they appear if you believe in them, you have to believe!

name: waddlerz
text: I try to believe and see the light, and yet reason just tells me that he has flippers.  Maybe if Philippe also believes he has hands he will appear

name: bossadelic
text: otters have hands. a simple google image search will confirm this.

name: monkey-of-death
text: The first and only time those terrible Calvin peeing things have been funny. The smirk while he washes his hands is hysterical.

name: petitegitan
text: I would totally put Calvin washing his hands on my car.

name: deancain29
text: me too

name: nighttoad
text: i disagree.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ARREST THEM ALL!!

name: vondicus
text: The arc of his urine stream is quite impressive. It would seem to bend toward justice.

name: lemurthrash
text: if bill watterson ever read this strip perhaps this would be been the only officially licensed calvin sticker.

name: stuart
text: I hate to be an asherdan, but it's really not likely he would ever agree to any merchandising.

name: lereya
text: So I never actually bother to read asherdan's comments.  And now I never have to, because I know the general MO.  Thanks!  (This is not sarcasm.)

name: stuart
text: You can save yourself a ton of brain sadness by putting asherdan on your ignore list, followed by retardo.

name: johnnyrocker
text: There was one officially licensed T shirt, actually. It was for some Art Museum or something. Look it up.

name: charchar
text:
Yo. [IMGS OFF]

Guess who firgured out how to

BBCODE PICTUUUUUURES!!!!

name: spinynorman
text:
My girlfriend's debate teacher in High School was Bill Watterson's brother. As the debate captain, she got to speak to him on the phone about designing T-shirts for the debate team. The one they decided on was a picture of a gent walking away from what is clearly the gates of the pits of Hell, adjusting his tie and contentedly whistling. Above it reads the words, ALL IN A DAY'S WORK

My girlfriend is magic.

name: ted0phile
text:
Oh... Oh my.

That is, and I say this with absolutely no sarcasm or exaggeration, the coolest thing I've ever heard.

name: belgand
text: That sounds like a truly amazing t-shirt. If there is possibly a picture of it I would be in love with the ability to see it.

name: i_love_kate
text: Marry her.

name: wolfensti
text: NOW

name: libelandslander
text: Spinynorman, I hope you are still with this girl, because she is still as rad as the first time I read this comment.

name: mr_pete
text: Philippe assumes that those pickup trucks have been vandalized to remove the second sticker. It makes him mad!

name: crinklebat
text: God. Is so perfect.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: Philippe will revolutionize the "Bad-Boy" archetype.

name: jackparsons
text: A comment left by jackparsons was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, hcaz, toughasnails001)

text: Genius.

name: vincentkv
text:
Two magnets just showed up on my dad's fridge: Calvin urinating on "Made in China" and, Calvin urinating on...

"Made in China"

name: libelandslander
text: I should probably should mention that I chubbied this for your presentation of the facts and not the content of the stickers.

text: fived for the depiction of responsible lavatory usage

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Pat: Faggot!
Lyle: sufck's the matter with me

name: splendorr
text: Lyle's blog post here is the grossest thing I have ever laughed vigorously at. This is the situation "rock bottom" was invented to describe.

name: direhaggis
text: The old car looks like a battery you can plug into an outlet. Like some Japanese air freshener that talks to you whenever you plug it in, throwing out inconsequential gibberish to lighten your day as it odorizes your living space for maximum tomorrow is calling today effect.

name: singtralala
text: so awesome!

name: daaaaang
text: I have just ordered a license plate frame that says "MY OTHER CAR IS ... ME!"

name: cpnglxynchos
text: daaaaang that is very silly.

name: genequagmire
text: Isn't that Bowser's vehicle from.... 3?  or was it world... can't remember.

name: pmbarrett
text: yes. yes it is.

name: tekende
text: Super Mario World. There is a resemblance, yeah.

name: nice-on-water
text: Sorry to "go there" but I'm what you call a pretty big C&H fan and I know for a fact a FACT that it was once mentioned that Calvin wears shorts but he's so short they reach his feet so that last sticker is wrong but still very funny I know it's a snobby-ass thing to say especially on a 4 year old comic but my inner 9 year old would not let me let that one slip by the one or two people who will come back and read the comments section of this comic in the next 6 months, sorry mom sorry dad sorry college sorry Bill Watterson sorry Christ Onstad sorry Calvin sorry Hobbes.

name: nice-on-water
text: Chris T. Onstad

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Yeah but all of those Calvin stickers were unauthorized merch so maybe the shorts are on purpose to distinguish it from a "real" Calvin drawing. Law suits and shit.

Onstad is way ahead of you, nice-on-water.

name: nice-on-water
text: Maybe.

name: subactuality
text: I firmly believe this strip is one of the best.
